p: The molecular formula of substance 2 was determined as C 7H 5O 5 using HRESIMS m/z 169.0749 [M-H] − (calcd for C 7H 5O 5, 169.0749); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CD 3OD) δ H 7.05 (s, 2 H, H2, 6); 13C NMR (100 MHz, CD 3OD) δ C 170.4 (C–7), 146.4 (C–3, 5), 139.6 (C–4), 122.0 (C–1), 110.3 (C–2, 6). Substance 2 was identified as gallic acid ( Figure 4) by comparing the data with those of the previously reported in the literature [ 27].
